</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Contract" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=329" />
<trait label="Divine" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=48" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 230 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You gain fire and mental resistance 5. When you die, you rise as an [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) creature with the [zombie](/Traits.aspx?ID=245) trait on the next round; if you are a PC, you become an NPC under [Walkena's](/Deities.aspx?ID=159) control. Your stats remain the same, except that your alignment changes to evil. If you reach 0 Hit Points as a zombie, you are destroyed and do not rise again.
